original_title: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (4KG PAIR BLACK)
optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 4kg Pair (2 x 4kg), Black Hexagon Dumbbells with Vinyl Coated Grip, Cast Iron Core Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training, Ideal Hand Weights for Women

key_features: Color Coded Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
image_analysis.ai_description: The product features a pair of black dumbbells with the KAKSS brand printed in white on the hexagonal ends, indicating a 4KG weight. The dumbbells have a vinyl-coated surface for a comfortable, non-slip grip. Their hexagon-shaped edges prevent rolling and allow for stable storage. The construction includes a professional-grade cast-iron core, ensuring durability for gym exercises.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Thick vinyl coating prevents slipping and provides comfortable grip during workouts.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheaper rubber coatings often peel off after minimal use, leaving messy residue.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hexagon-shaped ends prevent rolling for safer storage and more stable floor exercises.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round dumbbells frequently roll away on floors, creating safety hazards and frustration.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Professional-grade cast-iron core ensures lasting durability and consistent weight distribution.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Budget weights often use inferior fillers that shift, causing imbalance and inaccurate weight.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Proudly made in India with quality materials for reliable long-term home gym use.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Many low-cost imports have poor construction quality and break down quickly with regular use.
